Ice, Lunarpine, and Razor Claw aproached the Cybertronian Fire, Lunarpine
used his form for the scanners to react to. since it worked at the ark he
figured it might work here. Ice and Razor Claw remained in beast mode both
hoping no trouble arose.

The door slid open recognizing his Maximal signature. Ice opened her mind to
Lunarpine "Be careful my love, I don't want anything to happen to your
beautiful pelt."

"I'll take that as an order" Replied Lunarpine mentally back to Ice.

Ice looked around, "Any idea where the conference rooms are?" she asked out
loud, hoping open communication wouldn't arouse any suspicion.

"Sorry Ice, I've only been here once." Lunarpine sniffed the air, "I'm
getting a bunch of scents this way, if we follow them it should lead us to
the meeting."

"Then let's go, we haven't flown all this way to stand here talking." Ice
could sound more confident now that she was on friendly ground. She
remembered this place from when it had first crashed, the only time she'd
ever visited. She smelled the air, she too could sense the crowd of bots.

Razor Claw stood almost bolt upright as his eyes swept the ship, he didn't
like being here. even though he was no longer Predacon he still fealt as if
he were in enemy territory. "Settle down, you're with friends." Ice told him
mentally hoping to settle his nerves. she'd known since they entered Maximal
airspace that he was nervous about the mission. He acted ready to snap, she
hoped that he'd be able to hold his temper until they were far away.
